list_definition.definition: to put (a person, thing etc) in a place where it cannot be seen or easily found

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You hide, and I’ll come and look for you

list_definition.definition: a small concealed hut etc from which birds etc can be watched, photographed etc.

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He makes coats out of animal hides

list_ex_of_english: His tan jacket almost hid a red flannel shirt.
